languages.text: "К тому же нас голыми руками не возьмешь". {n}Инфернус-мастер похлопывает висящий на поясе пистолет.{/n} "Зря вы, что ли, даровали нам привилегию носить оружие".
"Besides, we came prepared." {n}His hand brushes against the pistol on his belt.{/n} "You gave us the privilege of bearing arms, and we won't let it go to waste."
languages.original_text: "К тому же нас голыми руками не возьмешь". {n}Инфернус-мастер похлопывает висящий на поясе пистолет.{/n} "Зря вы, что ли, даровали нам привилегию носить оружие".

traits.locale_text: "Besides, we came prepared." {n}The Infernus Master pats the pistol hanging on his belt.{/n} "You gave us the privilege of bearing arms for a reason."
"Besides, we came prepared." {n}The Infernus Master pats the pistol hanging on his belt.{/n} "You gave us the privilege of bearing arms for a reason."
"Besides, we came prepared." {n}The Infernus Master's hand brushes against the pistol on his belt.{/n} "You gave us the privilege of bearing arms for a reason."
"Besides, we came prepared." {n}The Infernus Master's hand brushes against the pistol on his belt.{/n} "You gave us the privilege of bearing arms for a reason."
"Besides, we came prepared." {n}His hand brushes against the pistol on his belt.{/n} "You gave us the privilege of bearing arms, and we won't let it go to waste."
"Besides, we came prepared." {n}His hand brushes against the pistol on his belt.{/n} "You gave us the privilege of bearing arms, and we won't let it go to waste."

languages.text: «Además, hemos venido preparados». {n}Su mano roza la pistola que lleva al cinto.{/n} «Nos otorgó el privilegio de llevar armas y no vamos a desaprovecharlo».
languages.original_text: "Besides, we came prepared." {n}His hand brushes against the pistol on his belt.{/n} "You gave us the privilege of bearing arms, and we won't let it go to waste."

traits.locale_text: «Además, hemos venido preparados». {n}Su mano roza la pistola que lleva al cinto.{/n} «Nos otorgó el privilegio de llevar armas y no vamos a desaprovecharlo».

languages.text: 「それに、準備はしてきました」{n}男の手がベルトのピストルに触れる。{/n}「あなたは、私たちに武器を持つ特権を与えてくれました。それを無駄にはさせません」
languages.original_text: "Besides, we came prepared." {n}His hand brushes against the pistol on his belt.{/n} "You gave us the privilege of bearing arms, and we won't let it go to waste."

traits.locale_text: 「それに、準備はしてきました」{n}男の手がベルトのピストルに触れる。{/n}「あなたは、私たちに武器を持つ特権を与えてくれました。それを無駄にはさせません」

languages.text: “不仅如此，我们有备而来。”{n}他的手摸着腰带上的手枪。{/n}“您赐予了我们携带武器的特权，我们是不会白白浪费的。”
languages.original_text: "Besides, we came prepared." {n}His hand brushes against the pistol on his belt.{/n} "You gave us the privilege of bearing arms, and we won't let it go to waste."

traits.locale_text: “不仅如此，我们有备而来。”{n}他的手摸着腰带上的手枪。{/n}“您赐予了我们携带武器的特权，我们是不会白白浪费的。”

languages.text: "Außerdem sind wir vorbereitet." {n}Seine Hand streift kurz die Pistole an seinem Gürtel.{/n} "Ihr habt uns das Privileg gewährt, Waffen zu führen, und es wäre doch schade, das nicht zu nutzen."
languages.original_text: "Besides, we came prepared." {n}His hand brushes against the pistol on his belt.{/n} "You gave us the privilege of bearing arms, and we won't let it go to waste."

traits.locale_text: "Außerdem sind wir vorbereitet." {n}Seine Hand streift kurz die Pistole an seinem Gürtel.{/n} "Ihr habt uns das Privileg gewährt, Waffen zu führen, und es wäre doch schade, das nicht zu nutzen."

languages.text: « En plus, on est pas venus les mains vides, {n}ajoute-t-il en effleurant le pistolet accroché à sa ceinture.{/n} Vous nous avez accordé le privilège de porter des armes, et on a bien l'intention de s'en servir. »
languages.original_text: "Besides, we came prepared." {n}His hand brushes against the pistol on his belt.{/n} "You gave us the privilege of bearing arms, and we won't let it go to waste."

traits.locale_text: « En plus, on est pas venus les mains vides, {n}ajoute-t-il en effleurant le pistolet accroché à sa ceinture.{/n} Vous nous avez accordé le privilège de porter des armes, et on a bien l'intention de s'en servir. »

languages.text: "Ayrıca hazırlıklı geldik." {n}Eli, belindeki tabancaya sürtünüyor.{/n} "Bize silah taşıma hakkını verdiniz, boşa kullanmayacağız bunu."
languages.original_text: "Besides, we came prepared." {n}His hand brushes against the pistol on his belt.{/n} "You gave us the privilege of bearing arms, and we won't let it go to waste."
